text: David Tyre Bishop (March 9, 1929 - August 3, 2020) was an American lawyer and politician. Bishop was born in Syracuse, New York. He was a member of the Minnesota House of Representatives from 1983 to 1992 and 1993 to 2002. He was a Republican.Minnesota Legislators; Past & Present-David Tyre Bishop Bishop died on August 3, 2020 in Rochester, Minnesota at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Lawyers from Minnesota Category:Politicians from Minnesota Category:Politicians from Syracuse, New York Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Rochester, Minnesota Category:Lawyers from New York (state)
title: David Bishop (American politician)
